headline: BTIG, RBC Capital, and Wells Fargo Cut Duke Energy (DUK) Price Targets
summary: Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) is one of the 12 Best Oil and Gas Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 30, BTIG reduced its price target on Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) from $150 to $141 and kept its Buy rating on the stock. This update comes as part of a broader research note where BTIG […]
